languages.text: {n}Техножрец изучает высушенные ягоды и замирает. Вы слышите отчетливое щелканье: церебральные {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторы{/g} заняты работой.{/n} "Кореника стелющаяся, типичное растение западного полушария. Мы изучали возможность промышленного культивирования, однако процесс был признан неэффективным ввиду специфических требований к почве, которая представлена в нужном составе лишь на архипелагах планеты".

traits.locale_text: {n}Техножрец изучает образцы почвы и замирает. Вы слышите отчетливое щелканье: дополнительные когитаторы заняты работой.{/n} "Состав почвы включает в себя вкрапления полиморфных модификаций углерода, характерных для западного полушария. Такие образцы были получены нами при исследовании отдаленных территорий, близких к мировому океану планеты".

languages.text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец изучает высушенные ягоды и замирает. Вы слышите отчетливое щелканье: церебральные {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторы{/g} заняты работой.{/n} "Кореника стелющаяся, типичное растение западного полушария. Мы изучали возможность промышленного культивирования, однако процесс был признан неэффективным ввиду специфических требований к почве, которая представлена в нужном составе лишь на архипелагах планеты".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the soil samples and goes still. You heard distinct clicks as his additional cogitators process this information.{/n} "The soil composition contains disseminations of polymorphic modifications of carbon typical of the western hemisphere. We obtained similar samples when investigated remote territories considered less suitable for cultivation."

{n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You heard distinct clicks as his cerebral cogitators process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet" .

{n}The Tech-Priest studies the soil samples and goes still. You heard distinct clicks as his additional cogitators process this information.{/n} "The soil composition contains disseminations of polymorphic modifications of carbon typical of the western hemisphere. We obtained similar samples when investigated remote territories considered less suitable for cultivation."

We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

{n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

languages.text: {n}ドライベリーを観察していた技術司祭が、静止する。彼の脳にある{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}がこの情報を処理していると、独特のクリック音が鳴る。{/n}「クヌギの代表的な植物で、西半球ではよく見られる植物です。この植物は工業的に栽培できるのかを調査していましたが、特殊な土壌が必要なため栽培は非効率だと判明しました。この星の群島でしか見られない組成の土壌です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライベリーを観察していた技術司祭が、静止する。彼の脳にある{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}がこの情報を処理していると、独特のクリック音が鳴る。{/n}「クヌギの代表的な植物で、西半球ではよく見られる植物です。この植物は工業的に栽培できるのかを調査していましたが、特殊な土壌が必要なため栽培は非効率だと判明しました。この星の群島でしか見られない組成の土壌です」

languages.text: {n}文泽莱斯仔细检查着干瘪的浆果，一动不动。你听到他大脑内{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}在处理信息时，发出了响亮的咔哒声。{/n}“这是匍匐蓼，是西半球的典型植物。我们曾研究过工业化种植的可能性，但后来发现，由于这种植物对土壤的特殊要求，种植效率很低。只有在这颗行星的群岛区域，才能找到适合种植的土壤。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

traits.locale_text: {n}文泽莱斯仔细检查着干瘪的浆果，一动不动。你听到他大脑内{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}在处理信息时，发出了响亮的咔哒声。{/n}“这是匍匐蓼，是西半球的典型植物。我们曾研究过工业化种植的可能性，但后来发现，由于这种植物对土壤的特殊要求，种植效率很低。只有在这颗行星的群岛区域，才能找到适合种植的土壤。”

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote estudia las bayas mustias y se queda estático. Se oyen claros chasquidos cuando sus {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitadores{/g} cerebrales procesan la información.{/n} «Tardo trepador, una planta autóctona del hemisferio occidental. Estudiamos la posibilidad de cultivarlo de manera industrial, pero el proceso cayó en saco roto por el sustrato tan específico que necesita, cuya composición solo se encuentra en los archipiélagos del planeta».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote estudia las bayas mustias y se queda estático. Se oyen claros chasquidos cuando sus {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitadores{/g} cerebrales procesan la información.{/n} «Tardo trepador, una planta autóctona del hemisferio occidental. Estudiamos la posibilidad de cultivarlo de manera industrial, pero el proceso cayó en saco roto por el sustrato tan específico que necesita, cuya composición solo se encuentra en los archipiélagos del planeta».

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester untersucht die getrockneten Beeren und verstummt. Du hörst deutliche Klicks, als seine {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitatoren{/g} die Informationen verarbeiten.{/n} "Kriechkraut, eine typische Pflanze der westlichen Hemisphäre. Wir haben die Möglichkeit des industriellen Anbaus erwogen, aber der Prozess war nicht effizient genug, weil der Boden bestimmte Anforderungen erfüllen muss, wie sie in korrekter Zusammensetzung nur auf den Archipelen des Planeten vorkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester untersucht die getrockneten Beeren und verstummt. Du hörst deutliche Klicks, als seine {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitatoren{/g} die Informationen verarbeiten.{/n} "Kriechkraut, eine typische Pflanze der westlichen Hemisphäre. Wir haben die Möglichkeit des industriellen Anbaus erwogen, aber der Prozess war nicht effizient genug, weil der Boden bestimmte Anforderungen erfüllen muss, wie sie in korrekter Zusammensetzung nur auf den Archipelen des Planeten vorkommen."

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre étudie les baies séchées puis se fige. Vous entendez distinctement ses {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateurs{/g} cérébraux émettre des cliquetis en traitant l'information.{/n} « L'hurlebeuse rampante est une plante commune de l'hémisphère occidental. Nous avons étudié la possibilité d'une mise en culture industrielle, mais le processus s'est révélé inefficace à cause des besoins spécifiques en termes de terre, dont on ne trouve la bonne composition que dans les archipels de la planète. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre étudie les baies séchées puis se fige. Vous entendez distinctement ses {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateurs{/g} cérébraux émettre des cliquetis en traitant l'information.{/n} « L'hurlebeuse rampante est une plante commune de l'hémisphère occidental. Nous avons étudié la possibilité d'une mise en culture industrielle, mais le processus s'est révélé inefficace à cause des besoins spécifiques en termes de terre, dont on ne trouve la bonne composition que dans les archipels de la planète. »

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip kurumuş yemişleri inceliyor ve bir süre sabit kalıyor. Beynindeki {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarların{/g} bu bilgiyi işlerken çıkardığı hafif tıkırtıları duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Sarmaşıklarda yetişen bir tip yaban otu. Batı yarım kürede yaygın bulunan bir bitkidir. Sınai kapsamda yetiştirme ihtimalini de değerlendirdik ancak yalnızca gezegendeki takımadalarda bulunan, belirli niteliklere sahip bir tür toprak gerektireceği için bu işlemin efektif olmayacağı sonucuna vardık."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest studies the dried berries and goes still. You hear the distinct clicks as his cerebral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitators{/g} process this information.{/n} "Creeping creeweed, a typical plant of the western hemisphere. We have studied the possibility of industrial cultivation, but the process was found to be inefficient due to the specific requirements of the soil, which is found in the right composition only in the archipelagos of the planet."

Beynindeki {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}ların bu bilgiyi işlerken çıkardığı hafif tıkırtıları duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Sarmaşıklarda yetişen bir tip yaban otu. Batı yarım kürede yaygın bulunan bir bitkidir. Sınai kapsamda yetiştirme ihtimalini de değerlendirdik ancak yalnızca gezegendeki takımadalarda bulunan, belirli niteliklere sahip bir tür toprak gerektireceği için bu işlemin efektif olmayacağı sonucuna vardık."
